column1: A classic Barolo, this opens with textbook Nebbiolo aromas of pressed rose, leather, red berries, pipe tobacco and balsamic notes of eucalyptus. Boasting power and finesse, the firmly structured palate delivers red cherry, pomegranate, licorice and exotic spices framed in tightly knit, noble tannins that need time to unwind. It's balanced, with fresh acidity. Drink 2023–2043. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Figli Luigi Oddero 2013 Vigna Rionda Riserva (Barolo)

column1: Aromas of red cherry, pipe tobacco, menthol and star anise with a whiff of new leather shape the nose of this fragrant, captivating wine. The intense, structured palate doles out raspberry compote, licorice, graphite, crushed mint and a whiff of smoke. It's impeccably balanced, with firm, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Compelling and fragrant, this gorgeous wine opens with intense aromas of pressed rose, fragrant blue flower, incense, pine and a whiff of smoky flint. The precise, structured palate is loaded with finesse, delivering ripe Marasca cherry, strawberry compote, licorice and white pepper alongside tangy mineral and an earthy hint of black olive. It's beautifully balanced, with enveloping, refined tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2023–2040. KERIN O’KEEFE

Underbrush, tilled soil, blue flower, pipe tobacco and wild berry aromas mingle together with leather and menthol. Firmly structured and enveloping, the delicious palate doles out raspberry compote, dried cherry, baking spice and star anise, while tightly woven but fine-grained tannins provide support. It's nicely balanced, with bright acidity. It's already tempting, but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2023–2043. KERIN O’KEEFE

Rose petal, fragrant blue flower, wild berry, baking spice, menthol and new leather are just some of the aromas you'll find on this gorgeous, fragrant red. Smooth, enveloping and loaded with finesse, the focused palate delivers pomegranate, red cherry, licorice and chopped mint alongside taut, lithe tannins and bright acidity. It's still youthfully tight but already shows depth and pedigree and will develop even more complexity with aging. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Earthy aromas of wild red berry, underbrush, new leather and tar come together on the nose of this delicious, enveloping red. The elegant, full-bodied palate delivers ripe brandied cherry, juicy raspberry, truffle, licorice and baking spice set against a backbone of firm, fine-grained tannins. It's already impressive, but give it time to develop even more complexity. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Giovanni Rosso 2015 Poderi dell'Antica Vignarionda Ester Canale Rosso (Barolo)
column5: Poderi dell'Antica Vignarionda Ester Canale Rosso

column1: This stunning red opens with a captivating fragrance of perfumed berry, rose, sandalwood and aromatic herbs. Smooth, elegant and delicious, the intense palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and baking spice, while a menthol note lingers on the close. Taut, polished tannins and fresh acidity give it great tension and balance. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of incense, rose, iris and eucalyptus carry the nose of this compelling wine. The full-bodied palate is smooth and enveloping, delivering juicy black cherry, pomegranate, licorice, tobacco and clove. It has a fantastic combination of structure and finesse that shows the power of Serralunga and the elegance that is the hallmark of this estate. Hold for even more complexity. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Enticing scents of pipe tobacco, wild berry, pressed rose and eucalyptus form the nose along with whiffs of new leather. Juicy, savory and structured, the enveloping palate boasts loads of finesse, doling out succulent black cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and mocha. It's already approachable but will offer years of pleasure thanks the fruit richness, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Fratelli Alessandria 2015 San Lorenzo di Verduno (Barolo)

column1: This radiant, perfumed red opens with enticing scents of fragrant purple flowers, woodland berries and aromatic herbs with a whiff of tilled earth. The delicious palate is elegant and enveloping, doling out juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon and star anise. It's already approachable but will also offer years of enjoyment thanks to polished tannins and bright acidity. Drink through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE

Enticing varietal scents of pressed rose, new leather, perfumed berry and dark spice fill the glass. Showing power, finesse and restraint, the tight, polished palate delivers crushed raspberry, pomegranate, star anise and tobacco framed in firm, noble tannins. It's vibrant, balanced and ageworthy, with bright acidity. Drink 2024–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Made with grapes from the estate's oldest vines, planted in 1931, this compelling red opens with alluring scents of forest berries, black spices and pipe tobacco. It's full bodied and structured but also extremely elegant, delivering succulent red cherry, cranberry, licorice, clove and white pepper set against tightly woven, fine-grained tannins. Fresh acidity provides balance and longevity. Drink 2023–2038. KERIN O’KEEFE

Enticingly floral, this fragrant red opens with aromas of rose, violet and iris that mingle with perfumed berry and eucalyptus. The palate is equally captivating, boasting great finesse that surrounds strawberry compote, raspberry, star anise and crushed herbs before a white pepper note graces the lingering close. It's impeccably balanced, with bright acidity and taut, refined tannins. Drink 2023–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: G D Vajra 2015 Coste di Rose (Barolo)

column1: Aromas of wild red berries, violet, Mediterranean herbs and eucalyptus mingle together with exotic spice and smoky graphite on this gorgeous, fragrant red, made with 95% Nerello Mascalese and 5% Nerello Cappuccio. The elegant palate has great tension and finesse, doling out raspberry compote, ripe blackberry, licorice and a hint of almond before an orange zest finish. It's superbly balanced, with taut, silky tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2029. KERIN O’KEEFE

Underbrush, wild berry, blue flower, camphor and wet stone aromas lift out of the glass. The smooth palate is loaded with finesse, delivering succulent red cherry, strawberry compote, blood orange, star anise and a hint of tobacco framed in taut, polished tannins. Bright acidity keeps it beautifully balanced, and a tangy mineral note graces the close. Drink 2023–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE

From one of the most celebrated vineyards in the denomination, this opens with alluring aromas of rose, menthol, perfumed berry, pine forest and new leather. Structured and loaded with finesse, the compelling palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and cinnamon along with crushed mint. Tightly knit, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity provide ageworthy support and tension. Drink 2023–2040. KERIN O’KEEFE

From one of the most celebrated vineyards in the denomination, this stunning red opens with enticing scents of rose, camphor, aromatic herbs and a whiff of sandalwood. The succulent, elegant palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, crushed pomegranate, licorice and sweet tobacco framed by taut, polished tannins. It's nicely balanced by fresh acidity. Drink 2022–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE

Intensely fragrant, this offers enticing scents of iris, violet and rose that mix with perfumed berry and botanical herbs. It's loaded with finesse and flavor, doling out raspberry compote, crushed Morello cherry, licorice and a hint of mocha while taut, fine-grained tannins provide support. Fresh acidity keeps it impeccably balanced. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Balsamic aromas of eucalyptus mingle with camphor, wild red berry and pipe tobacco on this full-bodied red. Tightly knit and enveloping, the savory palate delivers dried Marasca cherry, cranberry and licorice set against firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Rose, woodland berry and balsamic aromas of eucalyptus and pine are front and center on this fragrant red. The full-bodied, compelling palate has structure and finesse, delivering red cherry, cranberry, licorice and orange zest set against a backbone of assertive but noble tannins. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

A blend of predominantly Nerello Mascalese and a small percentage of Nerello Cappuccio, this fragrant red opens with enticing scents of wild red bery, underbrush, blue flowers, Mediterranean scrub and a whiff of warm spices. The taut, polished palate boasts elegance and tension, delivering raspberry compote, strawberry, star anise and blood orange before a mineral, almost salty finish. Fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide finesse and support. Drink 2021–2028. KERIN O’KEEFE

This offers textbook Nebbiolo aromas of rose, forest floor, red berry, tobacco and a balsamic whiff of eucalyptus. The enveloping, delicious palate has structure and finesse, doling out juicy Morello cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and clove framed in tightly knit but refined tannins. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of rose petal, grilled herb, camphor and a whiff of pipe tobacco shape the nose. Elegantly structured, the smooth, delicious palate doles out crushed raspberry, cherry compote, cinnamon and licorice while taut, fine-grained tannins provide finesse and support. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Perfumed red berry, rose, tobacco and menthol aromas are front and center on this fragrant red. The structured, full-bodied palate delivers raspberry compote, pomegranate, licorice and wild herbs, while taut, polished tannins and fresh acidity provide support and balance. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Rose, fragrant purple flower and botanical herb aromas meld together with a whiff of camphor. Savory and chiseled, the focused palate delivers succulent sour cherry, pomegranate, cinnamon and star anise before a tobacco finish. Tightly knit but extremely refined tannins and vibrant acidity lend support and balance. Drink 2022–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE

You'll find enticing scents of rose, violet, woodland berry, tobacco and a heady whiff of pine on this fragrant, full-bodied red. The juicy, delicious palate shows focus and intensity, doling out succulent raspberry, ripe red cherry, blood orange, licorice and baking spice framed in polished tannins. It's already showing beautifully but will also offer years of enjoyment. Drink 2020–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: G D Vajra 2015 Bricco delle Viole (Barolo)

column1: Balsamic aromas of eucalyptus mingle with enticing scents of wild berry, rose, espresso and tobacco. On the full-bodied, elegant palate, smooth, fine-grained tannins lithely support Marasca cherry, cranberry, star anise and exotic spice while fresh acidity keeps it balanced. One of the best showings I've had of Ornato so far. Drink 2021–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of chopped mint, rose and red berry mingle with whiffs of French oak and menthol. The firm, full-bodied palate offers dried cherry, pomegranate, licorice, espresso and tobacco alongside tightly wound, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Pressed rose, pine forest, truffle, tobacco, leather and camphor aromas make for a classic Nebbiolo fragrance. The enveloping palate boasts structure and complexity, delivering raspberry compote, pomegranate, licorice and tobacco set against tightly knit, noble tannins before a firm finish. Drink 2021–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE

Rose, violet, red berry and pine aromas take center stage on this stunning red. The delicious palate is taut and enveloping, offering cranberry, red cherry, exotic spice and licorice while firm, fine-grained tannins provide the framework. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of rose, woodland berry and menthol with a whiff of pipe tobacco fill the glass. Full bodied and loaded with finesse, the structured, elegant palate delivers juicy Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and cinnamon, while taut, fine-grained tannins provide support. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced and focused. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

White spring flower, orchard fruit and Mediterranean brush are some of the aromas you'll find on this radiant, enticing sparkler. Made entirely with Carricante, the bright, elegant and savory palate delivers green apple, Bartlett pear, white peach and lemon zest set against a silky perlage along with a hint of white grapefruit. Bright acidity keeps it impeccably balanced. On the crisp, dry close, a saline note lifts the finish. KERIN O’KEEFE

Red berry and rose aromas mix with scents of forest floor and balsamic whiffs of eucalyptus on this fragrant red. Full bodied and linear, the vibrant palate shows good tension, offering ripe Marasca cherry, pomegranate, licorice and tobacco framed in firm, fine-grained tannins. It will develop even more complexity with aging. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Violet, iris, exotic spice and menthol aromas lead the way on this fragrant red. The firmly structured palate boasts elegance and tension, delivering cranberry, pomegranate, licorice and white pepper set against tightly knit, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. It's still youthfully austere and will be even better after several more years of aging. Drink 2023–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE

Always one of the most elegant bottlings from Serralunga, thanks to the higher sand content in the vineyard's soil, this opens with enticing scents of pressed rose, fragrant blue flowers, pipe tobacco and a whiff of camphor. Linear, structured and loaded with finesse, the palate evokes sour cherry, cranberry compote, cinnamon and licorice while tightly knit but extremely refined tannins provide support. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

The most recent addition to the firm's lineup single-vineyard Barolos, this opens with aromas of ripe red berries and purple flowers with a balsamic note of eucalyptus. Firmly structured and enveloping, the full-bodied palate delivers raspberry compote, licorice, tobacco and iron alongside a backbone of tightly knit, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2023–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Rose, wild red berry, baking spice and whiff of menthol waft out of the glass. Smooth and savory, the vibrant palate shows precision and finesse, offering raspberry compote, strawberry, cinnamon and star anise alongside polished tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2027. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Ettore Germano 2015 del Comune di Serralunga d'Alba (Barolo)

column1: Fragrant and savory, this exhibits the muscle and finesse of Serralunga. It opens with earthy aromas of rose petal, new leather, eucalyptus and just a whiff of game. These tones carry over to the taut palate along with dried cherry, pomegranate and licorice. Assertive but fine-grained tannins provide the backbone, while fresh acidity lends balance. Give it time to fully unwind. Drink 2025–2035. KERIN O’KEEFE

Enticing aromas of red berry, rose petal, leather and forest floor lead the nose. The elegant, savory palate delivers raspberry jam, juicy red cherry, star anise and tobacco alongside bright acidity and polished tannins. Drink 2021–2029. KERIN O’KEEFE

Rose, scorched soil, grilled herb and crushed berry aromas shape the nose along with a whiff of new leather. Made with organically cultivated grapes, the firm, full-bodied palate delivers dried Morello cherry, cranberry, star anise and tobacco set against tightly wound, noble tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. It's already tempting but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2023–2033. KERIN O’KEEFE

Underbrush, exotic spices, truffle, fragrant blue flowers and a whiff of botanical herbs mingle with whiffs of ripe, black-skinned berry. Full bodied and enveloping, the chewy, velvety palate doles out raspberry jam, fleshy Marasca cherry, licorice and cake spice alongside fine-grained tannins. It closes on a note of toasted hazelnut. Drink 2020–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE

Iris, woodland berry, pipe tobacco and wild herb aromas are front and center on this fragrant, focused red. Smooth, savory and polished, the structured palate offers juicy raspberry, pomegranate, licorice and a hint of coffee bean. Close-grained tannins and fresh acidity provide tension and balance. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

All it takes is a few swirls of the glass to release aromas of pressed rose, pine, botanical herbs, graphite and whiffs of pipe tobacco. Firmly structured, the palate also has finesse, delivering dried cherry, pomegranate, licorice and hints of coffee bean alongside fine-grained tannins. A great showing for this debut vintage. Hold for even more complexity. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Truffle, wild berry, pressed rose and pine forest aromas lead the nose on this elegant Barolo. The palate is taut, lithe and youthfully austere, delivering ripe Morello cherry, crushed raspberry and licorice alongside tightly wound but refined tannins. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

A potpourri of rose, wild herbs, violet and exotic spices shape the nose. The palate shows precision and finesse, evoking juicy pomegranate, red cherry, licorice and baking spice along with a hint of blood orange. Taut, refined tannins and firm acidity provide the framework. Drink 2022–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE

Violet, rose, ripe berry and minty aromas mingle with earthy whiffs of truffle, leather and game. The delicious, juicy palate doles out fleshy Marasca cherry, crushed black raspberry, licorice and tobacco framed in chewy, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2020–2027. KERIN O’KEEFE

Spanish broom, lemon drop and ripe orchard fruit are just some of the aromas you'll find on this stunning white. The aromas carry to the linear, elegant palate, with additional tones of Meyer lemon, apricot, Mediterranean herbs and salt. Tangy acidity provides balance throughout. KERIN O’KEEFE

This classically crafted Barolo has enticingly earthy aromas of forest floor, new leather, wild berry, violet and eucalyptus along with the merest whiff of game. The vibrant, savory palate doles out raspberry compote, crushed cherry, cinnamon and the same hint of game before a licorice finish. Tightly knit, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide support. Drink 2023–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Violet, Mediterranean herb, ripe red berries and a whiff of bread crust shape the fragrant nose. A heady combination of crisp and smooth, the radiant, chiseled palate delivers red currant, red cherry, citrus and flinty mineral alongside an elegant, refined perlage that lends finesse. It's balanced, with vibrant acidity that gives a tangy close to the dry finish. KERIN O’KEEFE
column3: Murgo 2014 Metodo Classico Extra Brut Rosé Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)

column1: Rose, violet, red berry, Mediterranean scrub and eucalyptus aromas form the nose on this fragrant red. The elegant palate is still young and nervous, offering juicy raspberry, cherry, star anise and orange slice set against vibrant acidity and taut, refined tannins. A tangy mineral note and brown spice linger on the finish. It needs time to calm down a bit, but it will age beautifully. Drink 2023–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE

Enticing scents of red berry, rose petal, pipe tobacco and white pepper pave the way. The succulent, elegant palate offers cranberry, juicy red cherry, star anise and a touch of orange zest framed in fine-grained tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink 2022–2032. KERIN O’KEEFE

Enticing floral scents of spring blossoms and Spanish broom mingle with summer orchard fruit and wet stone. The tangy, savory palate boasts finesse and mineral tension, delivering juicy Meyer lemon, creamy pear, yellow apple and saline before a white pepper finish. Fresh acidity brightens the rich flavors. KERIN O’KEEFE

Forest floor, wild berry, blue flower and pipe tobacco aromas mingle together on this. The savory palate shows tension, delivering juicy black cherry, baking spice and star anise alongside taut, refined tannins. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Tobacco, underbrush, eucalyptus and blue flower aromas shape the nose. Showing the potential of this challenging vintage, the succulent, polished palate offers juicy black cherry, cranberry compote, licorice and a hint of dried herbs accompanied by taut, fine-grained tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink 2022–2026. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of French oak, exotic spice and camphor mingle with whiffs of baked plum. The dense, full-bodied palate offers prune, fleshy Marasca cherry, vanilla and coconut alongside tightly knit, close-grained tannins that leave an austere, drying finish. Drink 2022–2030. KERIN O’KEEFE

Aromas of underbrush, ripe red berry, violet and vanilla mingle together in the glass along with a whiff of oak. On the full-bodied, elegant palate, youthfully austere but fine-grained tannins frame raspberry compote, juicy cherry, licorice and exotic spice before a firm finish. Give it time to fully develop.
